testcase.name: Scenario Outline: Addition -- Example #1 (a=2, b=3, result=5)
testcase.system-out: Given the calculator is reset When I add 2 and 3 Then the result should be 5

testcase.name: Scenario Outline: Addition -- Example #2 (a=10, b=20, result=30)
testcase.system-out: Given the calculator is reset When I add 10 and 20 Then the result should be 30

testcase.name: Scenario Outline: Addition -- Example #3 (a=-5, b=5, result=0)
testcase.system-out: Given the calculator is reset When I add -5 and 5 Then the result should be 0

testcase.name: Scenario Outline: Division -- Example #1 (a=10, b=2, result=5)
testcase.system-out: Given the calculator is reset When I divide 10 by 2 Then the result should be 5

testcase.name: Scenario Outline: Division -- Example #2 (a=9, b=3, result=3)
testcase.system-out: Given the calculator is reset When I divide 9 by 3 Then the result should be 3

testcase.name: Scenario Outline: Division -- Example #3 (a=5, b=0, result=error)

failure.message: Expected error for division by zero

testcase.failure: Step failed: Then the result should be error Expected: ZeroDivisionError Got: No error raised
testcase.system-out: Given the calculator is reset When I divide 5 by 0 Then the result should be error
